Reviews.Title: Very nice beginner feature phone
Reviews.Author: Jordan Xaviers "Technology Guy"
Reviews.Content: This phone is packed with features, just like what the listing says.FM radioWifiTouchpad (back)TouchscreenSlideout keyboardBlue-tooth ready / earphone includedGPS ready3g ready3.2 MP cameraQuadband/GSMHeadphone includedPlease note: No manual includedI think its possibly the best bang for the buck phone so far.528mhz cpuHandles micro SD up to 32gbOS: Android 2.13.5mm headphone jack100 MB storage, 256 MB RAM, 512 MB ROMDoes not play youtube vids out of the box, working on a fix for that.Bluetooth restricts incoming filetypes ? Possible issue with Android itself.Camera takes reasonable pictures, but it does not take good pictures in poor lighting. There MUST be good lighting. I have seen other reviewers berate the speed, but for a beginner phone its quite good. I am happy with it. Would buy the same phone again if this one got damaged within two years or if a cheaper one existed.[...]

Reviews.Title: Battery is terrible
Reviews.Author: Caio
Reviews.Content: The cell phone is good. You get what you pay for. The functions are ok. The good point is that it is android, easy to  use. The bad point is the battery that needs to be recharged everyday. It takes more then 4 hours to recharge it and after 20 hours you'll have to do it again. It is driving me craaaazy!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Henson
Reviews.Content: I received the phone within three days, it was well packaged and came with everything needs. My son is very happy with the many features on his Phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Emilio Contreras
Reviews.Content: You have everything with this phone , it's a bit slow compared to the top phones in the market but for the price is a great deal!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: kelvin
Reviews.Content: If you want value for your money this is an excellent Choice, it is small but has a lot of features, Camera takes good Photos, get a case to protect this investment

Reviews.Content: I love the Phone but I can not receive pictures on it. I had to buy another phone because of this.  need to know can I send the phone back for another one or my money back

Reviews.Content: el producto llego en el tiempo estipulado, en excelentes condiciones, recomendado totalmente este proveedor, muy responsable y el producto funciona al 100%

Reviews.Content: THIS PRODUCT WORKED FOR FIVE MONTHS THEN THE PHONE TOUCH SCREEN STOPPED WORKING!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! I ENJOYED THE PHONE FOR THE THREE MONTHS I HAD IT!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Content: I got this but sent it back becuse I just prefer my blackberry better, i can not do the touch pad thingy, but over all a great phone for the 10days i tried it out

Reviews.Title: Poco satisfecha
Reviews.Author: Marcela Hurtado
Reviews.Content: El wifi del telefono se desconecta el solo cada vez que se bloquea, se frizaba la pantalla constantemente, lo peor era a la hora de contestar una llamada, era casi imposible!!!, al querer colgarla era lo mismo, muchas veces tuve que quitar la bateria del movil para terminar una llamada, muy malo, no lo recomiendo....
